Drink driver a week off being free of interlock caught again on way to Motueka fishing trip https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/drink-driver-a-week-off-being-free-of-interlock-caught-again-on-way-to-motueka-fishing-trip/KATQSHRCMVGQBKYATTMCGW6DDE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/drink-driver-a-week-off-being-free-of-interlock-caught-again-on-way-to-motueka-fishing-trip/KATQSHRCMVGQBKYATTMCGW6DDE/ Tracy NealHe was driving drunk in a vehicle without a court-imposed interlock device. Mon, 17 Jun 2024 03:52:13 +0000 A repeat drink driver was caught driving drunk again on the road near Port Motueka while on an early morning trip to take a mate out fishing. Photo / Google Maps
Dunedin stadium boss Terry Davies suddenly resigns on the day he denies transtasman commute affected ability to do job https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dunedin-stadium-boss-terry-davies-denies-trans-tasman-commute-affects-ability-to-do-job/N5Z3WKQDHJG6HCK4MDVRFL2HMA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dunedin-stadium-boss-terry-davies-denies-trans-tasman-commute-affects-ability-to-do-job/N5Z3WKQDHJG6HCK4MDVRFL2HMA/ Ben TomsettTerry Davies made 17 return Australia-Dunedin trips in past 18 months at his own expense. Mon, 17 Jun 2024 03:48:00 +0000 Terry Davies, chief executive of Dunedin's Forsyth Barr Stadium, has resigned after earlier denying that a trans-Tasman commute affects his ability to do his job.
